artist: Engraver: Cornelis van Caukercken; Publisher: Jan Meyssens
description: portrait,bust length of man turned right and looking back at viewer; wearing white ruff, cloak over right shoulder; right hand against chest
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: TOBIE VERHAECHT / two lines in French: Peintre en privelages .../... et mourut 1631 / C. van Caukercken fe.  Octavie Venus pinxit   I. Meyssens excudit  | on sheet in pencil: 2-540
title: Tobie Verhaecht
